attributes.action: Make all public transport services raise the age of child's fares to 18
attributes.additional_details: Children over the age of 15 often struggle being able to afford adult fares on buses, trains and other modes of transport
attributes.background: If adults fares start at 14 and over, that then classes us as adults, yet I cannot vote, drive, and partake in various other things because I'm underage as I am not 18. Travel warrants cannot be given to everyone so children may miss out on school, college, work or social experiences.
